Articles.Content:
'Ford Motor Company is launching a one-of-a-kind rocket-inspired muscle car to support educating the next generation of aviators.

The Saturn V-styled "Apollo Edition Mustang," ...' - [http://www.collectspace.com/news/news-070715a-ford-apollo-edition-mustang.html](http://www.collectspace.com/news/news-070715a-ford-apollo-edition-mustang.html)

![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
I've never wanted a Mustang this badly before.

Not a fan of white cars, or cars with a black hood and this one has both.

But THIS car speaks to me. I like it!

I was expecting a car stylized like a 50s car...

With tailfins and whatnot.

Although it is interesting.

> 
> I was expecting a car stylized like a 50s car...
> With tailfins and whatnot.
> 
> Although it is interesting.

Tailfins! Now that would be *cool!*

Wow that's sharp. My daily driver is an '05 GT. I race an '06 GT. So this is incredible I really want one.

I need to see more pictures. Because honestly... If someone didn't tell me it was modeled after the SaturnV I wouldn't tell what theme it was. It looks good don't get me wrong, but I think there's a lot more they coulve done to make it resemble more of the rocket. A more intricate paint job with rivets in key places would really set it off. And then the inside needs to resemble the command module to an extent. Switch guards on the center console would be nice.

I'd like to meet some of the astronauts at the auction in Wisconsin. I'm willing to bet they all sign their names on the car.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-08T17:19:56Z" title="07/08/2015 05:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 8, 2015</time> by Motokid600**
